snippet: Since the war in Europe entered its present critical phase with the German drive into Western Europe, an important section of American opinion has urged a change in our national policy toward the other war which is still raging in the Eastern worl...
lead_paragraph: Since the war in Europe entered its present critical phase with the German drive into Western Europe, an important section of American opinion has urged a change in our national policy toward the other war which is still raging in the Eastern world, the war of Japan against China.
